scripts.nuke: docker stop pgDocker && docker rm pgDocker && docker volume rm pgdata && rm -rf prisma/migrations
scripts.launchDocker: docker run --name pgDocker -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=docker -d -p 5432:5432 -v pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:latest
scripts.createDB: npx prisma generate migrate save --name 'init' --experimental && npx prisma generate migrate up --experimental
